bug.author: hemantha-kumara
bug.summary: Issue while merging PatchesJson6902 in MergeKustomizations
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Added one more overlay for argo componet to update ClusterRoles using PatchesJson6902 content of argo kustomization(argo/overlays/csf/kustomization.yaml) as below <denchmark-code>apiVersion: kustomize.config.k8s.io/v1beta1 kind: Kustomization bases: - ../../base patchesJson6902: - target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io version: v1beta1 kind: ClusterRole name: argo path: patch.yaml - target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io version: v1beta1 kind: ClusterRole name: argo-ui path: patch2.yaml </denchmark-code>
patch.yaml & patch2.yaml contents are as below
op: add path: /rules/0 value: apiGroups: - extensions resourceNames: - privileged resources: - podsecuritypolicies verbs: - use
What did you expect to happen: After kfctl generate I was expecting two patch files argo-ClusterRole.yaml & argo-ui-ClusterRole.yaml will get created with proper patch link in new kustomization.yaml <denchmark-code>apiVersion: kustomize.config.k8s.io/v1beta1 bases: - base configurations: - overlays/istio/params.yaml kind: Kustomization namespace: kubeflow patchesJson6902: - path: argo-ClusterRole.yaml target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io kind: ClusterRole name: argo version: v1beta1 - path: argo-ui-ClusterRole.yaml target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io kind: ClusterRole name: argo-ui version: v1beta1 resources: - overlays/istio/virtual-service.yaml </denchmark-code>
Instead i see only argo-ui-ClusterRole.yaml file is created with both patches added which is wrong <denchmark-code>ls kustomize/argo/ argo-ui-ClusterRole.yaml base kustomization.yaml overlays </denchmark-code>
Anything else you would like to add: I could see problem in this line
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/kustomize/kustomize.go
Line 972 in 0d52bb5
aggregatedPatch.Path = key + ".yaml"
where differnt path is added for each PatchesJson6902 key(name) patch but while creating new patch files only one file is created
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/kustomize/kustomize.go
Line 993 in 0d52bb5
patchErr := ioutil.WriteFile(patchFile, aggregatedPatchOps, 0644)
